If your having a problem playing the MP4, such as trying to play it with windows media player it will not work. Just open the torrent file, right click on the movie file, scroll over open with and choose QuickTime Player. The movie will open up, and start playing automatically with no problems what so ever. =P

You can not play this movie with windows media player. You have to manually open the torrent file, and right click on the movie. Then scroll over open with and choose Quicktime Player. It should automatically open the movie in Quicktime Player, then all you have to do is press play and enjoy.
This rip didn't play smoothly on nVidia ION. All other YIFY rips I've tried have worked fine.
